original_title: ASPI crosses 15,000 points for first time ever
original_body_lines: The All Share Price Index (ASPI) of the Colombo Stock Exchange recorded a new all-time high today (23), surpassing the 15,000 points mark for the first time in history.
Accordingly, as of 11:45 a.m., the index recorded a remarkable gain of 245 points to cross the milestone.
Meanwhile, today’s total market turnover is recorded as over Rs. 5 billion.
